question: Which is a correct statement about the last parts of the movie The Conversation?
correct_answer: Anns husband is murdered by the big corporation.
incorrect_answers: Anns boyfriend is murdered by the big corporation.
Harrys girlfriend, Amy, is taken prisoner by the big corporation until he gives them the video tape he has made.
Harry is murdered by the big corporation.
